sentences.english: The catalytic converter on your exhaust system contains cerium and lanthanum.
sentences.chinese: 排气系统上的接触反应器含有铈和镧。

sentences.english: We determined urine iodine of 6105 pregnant women with cerous sulfate reducing reaction.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用硫酸铈法测定了6105例孕妇的尿碘。

sentences.english: Electrode selection for oxidation of cerium by cation ion-exchange membran electrolysis in sulfuric acid solution was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 报导了硫酸介质中电解氧化铈的阴阳极选择。

sentences.english: It shows that the oxygenation of the sodium nitrate is obvious to cerium.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果证明，硝酸钠对铈的氧化作用是显著的。

sentences.english: CeO_2 nano-powders were synthesized by a carbon absorption and combustion method.
sentences.chinese: 采用碳吸附燃烧法制备氧化铈纳米粉体。

sentences.english: This paper has discussed the problem about analysis of different valence states of cerium in ceric products.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论了四价铈产品中铈的价态分析问题。

sentences.english: This paper has discussed the problem about analysis of different valence states of cerium in ceric products.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要讨论了四价铈产品中铈的价态分析问题。

sentences.english: The catalyst is more active than unsupported cerium oxide.
sentences.chinese: 所述催化剂比未负载的氧化铈的活性更大。

sentences.english: In early July, cerium oxide, used in the manufacture of ceramics and photosensitive glass, was $6-7 a kilo, she said. Later that month the price started to leap; now it is $36-38.
sentences.chinese: 二氧化铈用来制造陶瓷及光敏玻璃。

sentences.english: Objective To study the catalytic activity of ceric sulfate in the synthesis of butyl acetate.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究硫酸铈在合成乙酸丁酯工艺中的催化性能。

sentences.english: Preparation conditions for the manufacturing of analytic grade ammonium cerium nitrate are obtained.
sentences.chinese: 得出了制备分析纯硝酸铈铵复盐的方法。

sentences.english: The addition of cerium oxide could improve evidently the heat stability of the silicone rubber stock with exceptional hardness.
sentences.chinese: 加入氧化铈可以显著改善高硬度硅橡胶的热稳定性。

sentences.english: Ceratophyllum demersum could be used as the first selected plant to purge the radio-cerium in waters.
sentences.chinese: 因此金鱼藻可作为净化水体中放射性铈的首选植物。

sentences.english: The bottom layer incorporates two other common catalysts , cerium oxide and platinum.
sentences.chinese: 下层则包含氧化铈和铂两种常见的触媒。

sentences.english: Kinetics study on oxidation reaction of anethole to anisaldehyde by ceric sulfate;
sentences.chinese: 目的研究硫酸铈在合成乙酸丁酯工艺中的催化性能。

sentences.english: Determination of rare earth elements Cerium, Europium, Yttrium with DBC-chlorophosphonazo by solid phase spectrophotometry;
sentences.chinese: 偶氮氯膦固相光度法测定稀土元素铈，铕，钇。
